meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Guinea.
meanings.sent1: In Guinea, you can buy many things with just a few sylis.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for sylis at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The sylis in my pocket jingled happily as I walked.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a handful of shiny sylis, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The sylis sparkled in the sunlight, tempting me to spend them.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'sylus'.
meanings.sent1: She collected many sylis to add to her coin collection.
meanings.sent2: The teacher asked the students to write a sentence using the word 'sylis'.
meanings.sent3: The sylis on the table rolled around, trying to escape.
meanings.sent4: The sylis on the floor were like scattered stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The jar was filled with colorful sylis, each one a tiny treasure.
